fulltext:
Nguyễn Nhựt Trường 
Citizenship: Vietnamese ▪ Date of birth: 15/01/1988 
Contact 
Tel : 0917 484 379 
Email: nhuttruong88@gmail.com 
Address 
339/27 To Hien Thanh, District 3. Ho Chi Minh city. 
Summary 
• 
I care about product quality. 
• 
Modularize iOS app into powerful reusable components. Apply SOLID(object-oriented design) principles 
when writing code. 
• 
Sense of responsibility. 
• 
Agile methodologies in practice as a Scrum team member. 
• 
Experience in both iOS and Android. 
• 
I’m not afraid of new technologies, I can adapt them quickly. 
• 
Beside my tasks, I develop features which create value for customer.  
• 
I’m not afraid to go into anyone’s code. 
• 
I always try to create elegant solutions but understand that my job is to delivery value to customer. 
• 
I keep my code to be be simple for anyone can read it: Comment in code, Unit Testing, descriptive variable 
and method names. 
• 
I speed up my productivity by using launcher, clipboard manager, IDE shortcuts, Trello. 
• 
Ability to work under pressure. 
• 
Ability to good teamwork along with other team members. 
• 
With 7+ years experience of software development (with passion), I am quite confident I am the invaluable 
partner for your team. 
Key Skills 
 iOS programming 
Other skills 
• 
Swift, Objective-C 
• 
VIPER, MVVM architecture 
• 
Typhoon 
• 
TDD, BDD 
• 
UI Automation with Appium 
• 
ReactiveCocoa 
• 
Auto Layout, Size Classes 
• 
Memory management. 
• 
Customize container view controller transition. 
• 
Custom layout for UICollectionView 
• 
CocoaPods 
• 
UI Automation test 
• 
iOS multi-environment configuration 
• 
Config server Hudson to build iOS 
project(support running unit test, 
UIAutomation test) . 
• 
AFNetworking 
• 
GCD 
• 
Core Data 
• 
Core Graphic 
• 
Core Animation 
• 
Key value coding 
• 
KVO 
• 
Scrum 
• 
Could speak with native speakers quite fluently. 
• 
Unit Test 
• 
Manage team. 
• 
GIT workflow 
• 
React, ReactNative, Weex. 
• 
RxJS 
• 
Socket.IO 
• 
Node.js 
• 
Flex CSS 
• 
Raspberry pi 
• 
Rest API 
• 
Spring 
• 
Android build system: Maven, Gradle 
• 
Volley 
• 
ActionBar 
• 
Web Socket 
Socket.IO 
Apple Push Notification 
Facebook API 
Google Service 
• 
• 
•

Education 
03/2011  
Graduated engineering level from University of Information Technology, National 
University of Ho Chi Minh City. 
12/2009 – 05/2010  
Interned in joint-stock company JSC QueenB. 
2007 – 2010 
Finished MCSA, CEH, CCNA programs from Nhat Nghe Academy. 
05/2006 
Graduated from high school Thu Khoa Nghia, Chau Doc town, An Giang Province. 
Work experience 
Company: Lazada Tech Hub 
Team leader 
Product: Daraz mobile app 
07/2018 - Now 
ü Daraz mobile app: Daraz App allows you to get product details and reviews instantly and make a smooth and 
secure purchase. Furthermore, you get additional benefits of convenience, safety and product assortment. 
ü Itunes link:  https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/daraz-online-shopping-app/id978058048?mt=8 
ü Team size: 1 team leader, 4 iOS developers. 
ü Duration: 07/2018 – Now 
ü My role: 
•  Work with PM to create release plan for app. 
•  Work closely with Alibaba team to solve the issues which impact to release plan. 
•  Coordinate with Back-end developer to create API service. 
•  Organize tasks for members in team. 
•  Do code review, support team member about technical and communication with Alibaba developers. 
•  Setup MTL system for create Build daily. 
•  Work with a lot systems in Alibaba company: Translation, MTL, Argo… 
Company: Lazada Tech Hub 
Senior iOS developer 
Product: Lazada mobile app 
06/2015 - Now 
ü Lazada mobile app: The online shopping app that allow users shop conveniently on-the-go via mobile apps - 
browse, view, buy, track, and review your items anytime, anywhere. This app was received a reward “Best 
Online Shop App” in Indonesia 2015. 
ü Itunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lazada-shopping-deals/id785385147?mt=8 
ü Team size: 1 team leader, 5 developers. 
ü Duration: 06/2015 – Now 
ü My roles:  
• Design and build new architect for app. 
• Suggest and apply best practices in iOS for app(Size Class, Auto Layout, MVVM, Core Data, DI, SOLID 
principles). 
• Pair programming with members to finished big tasks. 
• Work with Web Service team to define API for mobile app. 
• Review code for team member. 
• Maintenance the old version app(Fix bug, implement new features, refactor code). 
Company: PYCO GROUP 
Senior iOS developer 
Product: RTL-FR 
03/2015 – 06/2015 
ü RTL-FR: iPhone app that enables users to have access on their mobile to a part of contents available from the 
website http://www.RTL.fr. 
ü Team size: 1 Project manager, 2 iOS developers. 
ü Duration: 1.5 months. 
ü My roles: 
• Design skeleton for application:create class helper connect with webservice, coding convention, structure 
project… 
• Review code for team member. 
• Communicate with Paris team to get feedback and suggest solution. 
• Imlement features for app: Module manage Program & Host, Integrate SDK, Player, Share radio program 
on Facebook. 
ü Technical skill sets: 
• Swift, SDWebImage, RaptureXML, Reachability, Caaptain SDK, Facebook. 
Company: PYCO GROUP 
Senior iOS developer 
Product: SpotHot 
12/2014 - 02/2015 
ü SpotHot: A chatting app running on iPhone. You can only see people in your immediate surroundings and once 
you match, there’s no boring each other with cliché pickup lines. Only live PhotoChatting and Drawing for quick 
ice breaking. 
ü Team size: 1 Solution architecture(SA), 1 Android developer, 1 iOS developer. 
ü Duration: 3 months. 
ü My roles:  
• Refactor code from previous phase for preparing for next phase. 
• Work with SA to design the new skeleton for application. 
• Work with SA to move duplicate business logic on Android and iOS to server. 
• Communicate with customer to get requirements, and suggest solutions. 
• Write Unit Test, BDD for app. 
• Implement features for app: Profile, chat feature, authentice with Parse using Facebook account, config 
multi-environment build for iOS… 
ü Technical skill sets: 
• Parse, iOS multi-environment configuration, Typhoon, Mixpanel, Crashlytics, Facebook SDK, MapKit, 
SDWebImage, Core animation 
Company: Axon Active Viet Nam 
iOS developer 
Product: getCalendar 
04/2014 - 09/2014 
ü getCalendar: Allows users to view shared calendar from their colleagues, check their availability before sending 
a meeting invitation. It’s now avialble for iOS & Android. The application can work without the internet connection 
in the offline mode. It supports to connect the Microsoft Exchange Server 2010 and later. 
ü Team size: 1 Scrum master, 2 iOS developers, 2 Android developers. 
ü Duration: 5 months. 
ü My roles: 
• Design skeleton for application: create class helper connect with webservice, coding convention, structure 
project… 
• Review code for team member. 
• Implement features for app: get events from Exchange Web Service, customize FFCalendar, synchronize 
feature, distribute builds for PO testing. 
• Communicate with PO to get requirements, and suggest solutions. 
• Write Unit Test. 
ü Technical skill sets:  
• Exchange Web Services, SOAP, RaptureXML, XMLPullParser, StoreKit, HockeyApp, Security, QuartzCore, 
CoreData, UIKit, CoreGraphics, SenTestingKit. 
Company: Axon Active Viet Nam 
iOS developer 
Product: PCS mobile Wallet 
08/2013 - 04/2014 
ü PCS mobile Wallet: It’s a safe, fast and easy way to shop with your PCS MasterCard®: With that application 
you will be able to: 
ü Manage your PCS MasterCard® (add cards, check your balance) 
ü Manage your shipping addresses. 
ü Add your MasterCard® and Visa card 
ü Card to card transfer for PCS MasterCard® 
ü Itunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/DE/app/id889859997 
ü Team size: 3 iOS developers, server team 
ü Duration: 8 months 
ü My roles: 
• Design skeleton for application: class helper connect with webservice, coding convention, structure 
project… 
• Communicate with PO to get requirements, and suggest solutions. 
• Suggestion solutions for improve quality application: integrate Hockey App to get crash report, Unit Test, 
structure project into separate module to make it can be reuse in multiple projects. 
ü Technical skill sets: 
• Netverify Mobile SDK, BAM Checkout SDK, SenTestingKit, JsonModel, AES Encryption/Decryption, 
HockeyApp, CocoaPods, AFNetworking, Jira, UIKit, Core Data, Core Animation, KVC 
Company: Axon Active Viet Nam 
iOS/Android/Window Phone developer 
Product: SCROOL -  Scrum Tool 
01/2013 - 08/2013 
ü SCROOL -  Scrum Tool: SCROOL is a Scrum Tool Set and now available for iOS and Android. This "Swiss 
Scrum pocketknife" provides some small Agile tool sets and support Axon Active company's daily Agile life. We 
developed this application based on company's experience in Agile Software development & testing. 
ü Links install:  
ü iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/scrool/id621118620?mt=8 
ü Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vn.axonactive.scrool  
ü Team size: 1 Scrum master, 2 iOS developers, 2 Android developers 
ü Duration: 8 months 
ü My roles:  
• Work with server team to implement feature “Planning online” on Node.js and Socket.IO 
• Design skeleton for application on iOS, Android, Window Phone. 
• Research to implement Socket.IO library for Window Phone. 
• Implement feature for application: Poker offline, poker online, Slider, layout for Cash/Count down clock. 
ü Technical skill set:  
• Web Socket, Socket.IO, Node.js, SenTestingKit, HockeyApp, Core data, Core graphic, Core animation, 
AddressBookUI, AudioToolbox, MediaPlayer, MessageUI, UIKit. 
Company: Axon Active Viet Nam 
iOS developer 
Product: iTeledata 
05/2012 - 12/2012 
ü iTeledata: This application for iPhone and iPad that allows user to search and browse information on Swiss 
companies and individuals. The application connects to a remote server and retrieves data via SOAP. Data is 
requested in parallel in order to increase the loading speed and make the application runs seamlessly. 
Application also has a lot of map view and draws many kinds of chart/graph to present complex data visually. 
ü Team size: 3 iOS developer, 1 Scrum master 
ü My roles: 
• Communicate with PO to get requirements, and suggest solutions. 
• Implement all features from iPhone to iPad 
ü Duration: 7 months 
ü Technical skill set: 
• Sudzc, MapKit, SOAP, UnitTest, UIKit, Core Graphic. 
DK Mobility 
iOS developer(Part time) 
Spakonect 
09/2014 – 11/2014 
ü Spakonect: SpaKonect is the first customizable enterprise mobile app system designed to be a dominant toolset 
for beauty salons industry! 
ü Link install: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/spabees/id945408628?mt=8 
ü Team size: 1 iOS developer, 1 Android developer, 2 server developers 
ü Duration: 2 months 
ü My roles: 
• Design skeleton for application. 
• Communicate with customer to get requirements. 
• Implement modules in app: Promotion, registration 
ü Technical skill set:  
• 
Zbar SDK, AFNetWorking, JSON Model, FFCalendar, UIKit, Apple Push Notification, Facebook API, 
distribute app for beta testing with ad hoc and in-house methodologies. 
QueenB JSC 
Java web developer 
Abacus/Merian  03/2011-08/2011 
Abacus/Merian: This Application is used actually in the local QueenB JSC company to manage tasks of 
employees. 
Technology and Tool: Spring, Maven, JSF, JSP, JQuery, Hibernate, Vaadin, MySQL, Oracle. 
Expectation 
• 
Work in an working environment with smart colleagues, modern equipment for more advanced professional 
skills. 
• 
To learn and communicate with foreign experts to further understand the culture and working style. 
Activities and Interests 
• 
Sports: badminton, snooker… 
• 
Take coffee with friends at the weekend. 
Languages 
• 
English: I can communicate with customers very well.

educations.school: University of Information Technology, National University of Ho Chi Minh City
